name: YANTRODHARA PENDANT
description: Energised Yantrodhara Hanuman pendant for protection against black magic and evil eye. Provides benefits such as karya siddhi, strengthens the mind, and removes obstacles from one's career and education.

name: VAGDEVI KAVACH
description: The Vageeshwari Kavacha is a powerful amulet designed to help children with learning difficulties and speech problems, improving their academic performance and communication skills.

name: SUDARSHANA YANTRA
description: The Shree Shatrughna deity, with its rich history spanning over 5000 years, holds a prominent place in spiritual traditions as a revered pilgrimage destination. Known as part of the 'Nalambala Yatra,' the worship of Lord Shatrughna, believed to be an incarnation of the Sudarshana Chakra, is deeply rooted in devotional practices.

name: SILVER TULASI  54 BEADS
description: Traditional Udupi Silver 54-Bead Tulasi Mala. Enhance your spiritual practice with this sacred mala, ideal for daily wear.

name: SILVER RUDRAKSHA 54 BEADS
description: Udupi Silver Panchmukhi Rudraksha Mala with 54 sacred beads, perfect for spiritual and devotional practices.

name: SUDARSHANA SALIGRAM MAALA
description: A sacred mala featuring genuine Saligrama stones, representing divine connection to Lord Vishnu, adorned with elegant silver accents.

name: PEARLS MALA 3 INCH
description: A 3-inch mala featuring lustrous pearls, ideal for adorning deities or personal meditation and prayer rituals.

name: NAVARATNA MALA
description: A 3-inch mala featuring nine sacred gemstones: Ruby, Pearl, Red Coral, Emerald, Yellow Sapphire, Clear quartz, Blue Sapphire, Hessonite, and Cat’s Eye, designed for deity adornment.

name: SILVER SHANKA
description: A traditional Udupi Silver Shanka, available in multiple sizes, perfect for enhancing spiritual rituals and ceremonies.

name: DAKSHINAVARTI SILVER SHANKA
description: Authentic Dakshinavarti Silver Shanka, available in various sizes, crafted for religious and spiritual practices.

name: 3 INCH CORAL MALA
description: This vibrant mala is designed for adorning deities, bringing a touch of sacred energy to your worship rituals. **Key Features:** - **Sacred Coral Beads:** Known for their spiritual significance and vibrant red color, ideal for deity adornment. - **Compact Size:** 3-inch beads make it suitable for both personal and temple use. - **Craftsmanship:** Carefully crafted to ensure authenticity and reverence in your rituals. Add this Coral Mala to your spiritual practice to enrich your connection with the divine and elevate your worship experience.

name: 3 INCH PEARLS- CORAL MALA
description: Elevate your worship with our 3-inch Pear-Coral Mala, crafted with care by Vajra Nakha. Featuring a blend of luminous pearls and vibrant red coral, this mala is perfect for adorning deities. **Benefits:** Pearl is known for its calming and protective qualities, while coral enhances vitality and courage, making this mala a powerful tool for spiritual growth and divine connection. Adorn your deities with this mala to infuse your rituals with grace and strength.

name: 11 INCH LAKSHMI COIN MALA
description: Adorn your deities with our exquisite 11-inch Silver Lakshmi Coin Mala, featuring a durable gold polish. This stunning mala combines the purity of silver with the elegance of gold, perfect for divine worship. **Benefits:** The Lakshmi coin design is believed to attract prosperity and abundance, enhancing the spiritual ambiance of your rituals and offerings. This long-lasting mala will add a touch of grace and divine energy to your worship of Goddess Lakshmi.

name: YANTRODHARA YANTRA
description: Energised yantrodhara hanuman yantra for protection against blackmagic , evil eye and gaining benefits like karya siddhi , strengthening the mind , removing obstacles from one’s career and education growth .package contains : nirmalya Prasadam , yantra , instructions on how to worship lord yantrodhara hanuman
